name: Dashmachine
short_description: Application dashboard with bookmarks, media discovery, and sleek UI.
description: Dashmachine is a slick application dashboard with features beyond just bookmarks. It includes media discovery (movies, TV), organizational apps with real-time data, bookmarks with favicon fetching, and a beautiful interface. Features include dark/light themes, drag-and-drop organization, embedded media information, and easy configuration through web UI.
